# Christopher N Maymon, PhD

**Experimental Psychologist | VR Developer | Data Analyst | Psychophysiologist**

I am a psychological scientist, teacher, and research consultant.

I specialize in designing ecologically valid experiments to answer complex psychological questions. My work integrates emerging technologies‚Äîsuch as immersive **virtual reality**, mobile **biosensing**, and **artificial intelligence**‚Äîto study human behavior in the real world.

An experimentalist at heart, I am constantly seeking open psychological questions that can be resolved through carefully designed research.

I provide end-to-end [consulting services](consulting.qmd) to researchers, labs, and companies.
